scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist && cp -r client/dist/* dist/ && cp -r server/dist dist/server
scripts.render-build: npm install && npm run build && npm run postbuild
